text: Tabebuia is a polyphyletic assemblage today comprising 66 spp. For example red lapacho T impetigosa is considered as Handroanthus impetiginosus by Mattos Evolution of a charismatic Neotropical clade Molecular Phylogeny of Tabeuia s.l. Crescentieae and allied genera Bignoniaceae https://www.arbolesornamentales.es/Tabebuia%20impetiginosa.pdf Typus is T. cassionoides (Lam.)DC. title: Tabebuia
